text: Can you believe that it's already been one whole year since Sir and Rumi Carter's births?! Their mother, Beyoncé, wished the baby twins a happy birthday while onstage at the On The Run II Tour with husband JAY - Z. Beyoncé welcomed the two new additions to her and Hov's family last year. However, the public still hasn't seen the babies'faces. We thought that Bey showed the twins onscreen at an On The Run II Tour concert last week, as words like “ LOVE IS UNIVERSAL ” and “ LOVE NEVER CHANGES ” appeared on a mega screen.
